name: Matidor.com
headline: Project management on a live map
description:
Matidor.com is a project management software for projects where you need to see what's happening live on a map. Natural resources companies such as energy operators and consultants manage their environmental activities across thousands of locations. Instead of switching between spreadsheets, they need to visualize their projects on a map and zoom into each one of them for details such as site drawings, tasks, costs and communications.

https://matidor.com

founders.name: Vincent Lam, Founder
founders.description: Vincent is a visionary and technologist at heart, with 20 years of experience of delivering world-class software. He specializes in product strategy and development, as well as technology transformation for SMBs and enterprises. Vincent previously led large-scale projects at Google and Dassault Systems, and has created a number of award-winning start-ups since 2011.  He currently held an MBA from the University of Ottawa, and a BASc in Computer Engineering from the University of BC.

founders.name: Sean Huang, Founder
founders.description: A Vancouver-based serial entrepreneur who has founded three startups and has more than 10 years of experience in sales and business development. From door-to-door sales with Telus to handling enterprise accounts, Sean was one of the fastest salesmen in his marketing firm to get promoted to senior sales manager for B2B campaigns. Sean has gone on to build startups in the VRAR space as well as having cross-border experience from his time spent in Shanghai.

#  Intuitive Project Management Platform for Field Services 
Tracking project deliverables across multiple locations can be fast and easy.
![a screen capture of matidor’s main dashboard for project greenland](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/home-banner.png)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/what-is-matidor.png)
##  What is Matidor? 
For people managing field-based work who struggle to track project deliverables across multiple sites.
Matidor is a project management software that provides instant access to project information by location.
Unlike spreadsheets and complicated software, Matidor uses an intuitive, map-based interface to organize project data, provide real-time insights and enhance team collaboration, all on a single platform.
[ How Matidor Works ](https://matidor.com/<#>)
✕
![rife-logo](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/rife-logo.png)
![Arup logo](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/arup.png)
![vertex](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/download-1-e1599747031390.jpg)
![West Country Logo](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/west-country-logo.png)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/green-infrastructrue-partners-logo.png)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/lambourne-environmental-logo-cropped.png)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/ridgeline-ambipar-logo.png)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/project-forest-logo.png)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/peyto-logo.png)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/steelreef-logo.png)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/hodge-vegetation-control-ltd-logo-cropped.png)
Project Management 
##  The Best Solution for Field Service Project Management 
Simplify your workflow with a single, integrated platform that brings together tasks, budgets, GIS, forms, files, and more—streamlining collaboration, saving time, and boosting productivity. Say goodbye to inefficiencies, miscommunication, and the challenges of juggling multiple tools. 
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/project-tracking-1x.png)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/project-map-1.png)
Project Map 
##  Maps were Meant to be Collaborative 
Visualize all your projects on the map. Get real time updates about budget performance and task completion so you can spot potential problems and rest easy. 
Team Collaboration 
##  A Single Platform for Everyone 
Streamline collaboration and decision-making on one single platform that allows owners, consultants, and contractors to access and share the same data in real time. Say goodbye to disjointed communication and fragmented data management, which lead to project delays, costly errors, and misaligned expectations. 
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/project-collaboration-1x.png)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Budget-management-min.png)
Budget Management 
##  Gain Clarity on Your Project Financials 
When you’re able to access updated budget data and get an overview of your project spend, you can block unwanted overheads and reduce cost overruns. 
Integrations 
##  Compatible and Flexible to Your Organization’s Needs 
Turn data from your existing tools into simple and actionable next steps. 
[ Learn More ](https://matidor.com/</integrations>)

Onboarding 
##  Seamless Setup and Data Migration 
Don’t stress about onboarding, we got you covered. 
[ Learn More ](https://matidor.com/</onboarding/>)
![an oil well in a field](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/home_oilgas-min.png)
#### Oil & Gas
Manage your portfolio, budget, reporting, asset inspections and more with a single source of truth for everyone from office to field.
[Learn More](https://matidor.com/</oil-and-gas/>)
![wind mills in a field](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/environmental-services.jpg)
#### Environmental Services
Transform your environmental project management with mapping integrations, client communication tools, site planning, and data analysis all in one place.
[Learn More](https://matidor.com/</environmental-services/>)
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/renewables-banner-768x193.jpg)
#### Renewables
Organize your renewable energy projects with budget monitoring, wind and solar asset management, data visualization, field updates, and more in one centralized platform.
[Learn More](https://matidor.com/<https:/matidor.com/renewables/>)
FAQ 
##  Frequently Asked Questions 
  * Does Matidor work offline? 
Yes, you can enable a project in offline mode to access it without internet connection. When you are back online, Matidor will automatically synchronize your data with the master database.
  * Can I generate reports with Matidor? 
Yes, you can generate general and custom reports to suit your needs
  * What if I still need help using Matidor? 
Matidor customer success team will assist you with onboarding sessions and will remain available during regular business hours for any further support.
  * Does my organization need to have a specific infrastructure for using Matidor? 
Matidor is a software as a service (SaaS) platform, and therefore there are no IT pre-requisites to use it. 
  * Can I share a project with external stakeholders? 
Yes, you can share your project(s) with external stakeholders. You can also define the level of access before sharing.
  * Can I store finished projects in Matidor? 
Yes, you can archive your projects in Matidor. When you need to reference archived information, it is as simple as toggling the project back to active. 
  * Is Matidor mobile friendly? 
Yes, Matidor is built to work with mobile phones and tablets. It is compatible with Android and iOS and is available to download on [Google Play](https://matidor.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.matidor.app.twa>) and [Apple Store](https://matidor.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/matidor-noa/id1603695775>).


If you have more technical questions, please don’t hesitate to email us at info@matidor.com or request a free demonstration session from [here](https://matidor.com/<https:/matidor.com/request-a-demo>) to discuss your questions in detail with one of our experts.

Any cookies that may not be particularly necessary for the website to function and is used specifically to collect user personal data via analytics, ads, other embedded contents are termed as non-necessary cookies. Onboarding 
##  Seamless Setup and Data Migration 
Don’t stress about onboarding, we got you covered. 
 Learn More ⟨54⟩
![an oil well in a field⟨55⟩]
#### Oil & Gas
Manage your portfolio, budget, reporting, asset inspections and more with a single source of truth for everyone from office to field.
Learn More⟨56⟩
![wind mills in a field⟨57⟩]
#### Environmental Services
Transform your environmental project management with mapping integrations, client communication tools, site planning, and data analysis all in one place.
Learn More⟨58⟩
![](https://matidor.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/renewables-banner-768x193.jpg)
#### Renewables
Organize your renewable energy projects with budget monitoring, wind and solar asset management, data visualization, field updates, and more in one centralized platform.
Learn More⟨20⟩
FAQ 
##  Frequently Asked Questions 
  * Does Matidor work offline? 
Yes, you can enable a project in offline mode to access it without internet connection. When you are back online, Matidor will automatically synchronize your data with the master database.
  * Can I generate reports with Matidor? 
Yes, you can generate general and custom reports to suit your needs
  * What if I still need help using Matidor? 
Matidor customer success team will assist you with onboarding sessions and will remain available during regular business hours for any further support.
  * Does my organization need to have a specific infrastructure for using Matidor? 
Matidor is a software as a service (SaaS) platform, and therefore there are no IT pre-requisites to use it. 
  * Can I share a project with external stakeholders? 
Yes, you can share your project(s) with external stakeholders. You can also define the level of access before sharing.
  * Can I store finished projects in Matidor? 
Yes, you can archive your projects in Matidor. When you need to reference archived information, it is as simple as toggling the project back to active. 
  * Is Matidor mobile friendly? 
Yes, Matidor is built to work with mobile phones and tablets. It is compatible with Android and iOS and is available to download on Google Play⟨59⟩ and Apple Store⟨60⟩.


If you have more technical questions, please don’t hesitate to email us at info@matidor.com or request a free demonstration session from here⟨61⟩ to discuss your questions in detail with one of our experts.

generated_description:
Matidor.com is a Vancouver-based startup that entered the tech scene in 2019 and quickly made waves as part of Y Combinator's Batch S21. With a tight-knit team of six, Matidor’s mission is straightforward yet innovative: to revolutionize project management using live mapping technology. 

Imagine you’re an energy operator or an environmental consultant juggling numerous projects across various locations. Instead of getting lost in spreadsheets and outdated software, Matidor places everything on an intuitive map interface. This allows users to visualize their projects in real time, offering insights into site specifics like drawings, budgets, tasks, communications, and more—all from a single platform.

### What Makes Matidor Stand Out?

1. **Live Maps for Collaboration**: Instead of disjointed updates, Matidor enables teams to visualize projects seamlessly on maps, promoting better communication and data sharing among owners, consultants, and contractors.

2. **Integrated Project Management**: From budget tracking to field data collection, Matidor integrates all project elements into one cohesive tool. This helps streamline workflows, reduce inefficiencies, and ultimately boost productivity.

3. **Flexibility with Integrations**: Whether you’re using ArcGIS, Slack, or various financial software, Matidor can work with your existing tools, transforming data into actionable insights.

4. **Industry-Specific Solutions**: Matidor caters specifically to sectors like oil and gas, environmental services, and renewables. Its use cases range from environmental site assessments to vegetation management, proving its versatility in distinct project scenarios.

5. **User-Friendly Onboarding**: The platform offers seamless setup processes and ongoing support, ensuring that organizations can switch to this live mapping system without a hitch.

### Current Focus and Future Plans

Matidor aims to simplify field-based project management, an area often burdened by multiple tools and miscommunication. With its real-time capabilities, it is poised to reshape how managers and teams approach project tracking and collaboration across the field.

If you’re intrigued (and you should be), check them out on their [official website](https://matidor.com/) or even better, book a demo to see how this software can enhance your project oversight.
